secondScreen.title: Accelerate Decentralized AI Development 100x
secondScreen.text: AI models run fully decentralized, with infinite scalability,empowering developers to accelerate decentralized AI application development by 100x across six blockchains: ETH, BSC, GIWA, XLayer,Base, and Mantle.

thirdScreen.text: The largest community-driven ecosystem for decentralized Al apps.

item1.title: Endless scalability
item1.description: Scalability without limits, enabling Al and Web3 applications to achieve unrestricted growth.

item2.title: GPU Driver
item2.description: GPU miners deploy Al models, developers don't need to manage or maintain them.

item3.title: Fluid Composability
item3.description: Developers can integrate effortlessly to build, link, and scale Al-powered Web3 applications with ease.
